Name: Color Phase
About the game: Overview: Enjoy a colorful puzzle-platformer experience in Color Phase! Find and use different colors to interact with the world around you in a variety of different ways to reach your goal! Features: Explore 20+ levels solving puzzles and completing dexterous challenges Utilize four (4) colors each with their own attributes and special ability There is a grappling hook This game will not hurt you About us: Developed by Heatwave Studio (formerly 25PercentGames), a student game development group based out of Arizona State University that aims to complete and publish one game each year. The game is a completely volunteer effort from an interdisciplinary team of students from across the academic and creative spectrum. We hope you enjoy what we made! Gameplay: Solve puzzles! Navigate platforming challenges!! I already said there's a grapple hook!!!
